    • Method Detail

      • filterString

        public static java.lang.String filterString(@NonNull
                                            java.lang.String title)
        Replaces all specific and Umlaut chars in the German alphabet with their equivalent strings.

        Ä => Ae,
        Ü => Ue,
        Ö => Oe,
        ä => ae,
        ü => ue,
        ö => oe,
        ß => ss

        Parameters:
        title - String - The String that will be filtered for Umlaut chars.
        Returns:
        String - The filtered string, if no Umlaut chars found, the returned string will be same as the given String param.
        Since:
        1.0
